shortcontents.shortcontent:
I) Introduction (fols. 6ra – 13va [l.6]) - Mäqdәmä wängel “Introduction to the Gospel” (fols. 6ra - 10ra [l.3]) - Letter of Eusebius to Carpianus (fols. 10ra [l.4] – 10rb) - Canon Tables (fols. 10v – 12rb [l.6]) - The “Synopsis of Classes” (fols. 12rb [l.6] – 12va) - On the reliability of the Gospels (fols. 12vb-13va [l.6]) II) Gospel of Matthew (fols. 13ra [l.6] – 43ra [l.15]) - Statement about the Eusebian sections (fol. 13ra [ls. 6-9]) - List of the “tituli” for the Gospel of Matthew – 56 titles (fols. 13ra [l.10] –13va) - Bәsratä Matewos “Gospel of Matthew” (fols. 16ra – 43ra [l.6]) - Postscript (fol. 43ra [ls. 9-15]). III) Gospel of Mark (fols. 43ra [l.17] – 62ra [l.19]) - Biography of Mark (fols. 43ra [l.17] – 43rb [l.13]) - Statement about the Eusebian sections (fol. 43rb [ls. 13-17]) - List of the “tituli” for the Gospel of Mark – 48 titles (fols. 43rb [l.18] – 43vb [l.9]) - Bәsratä Marqos “Gospel of Mark” (fols. 43ra - 62ra [l.10]) - Postscript (fol. 62ra [ls. 11-19]) IV) Gospel of Luke (fols. 62va – 99va [l.18]) - List of “tituli” for the Gospel of Luke – 82 titles (fol. 62va – 63ra [l.17]) - Bәsratä Luqas “Gospel of Luke” (fols. 64ra – 99va [l.12]) - Postscript (fol. 99va [ls. 13-18]) V) Gospel of John (fols. 99va [l.19] – 125rb) - Biography of John (fols. 99va [l.19] - 100ra [l.12]) - Statement about the Eusebian sections (fol. 100ra [ls. 14-19]) - List of the “tituli” for the Gospel of John – 20 titles (100ra [l.20] – 100rb [l.13]) - Bәsratä Yoḥannәs “Gospel of John” (fols. 101ra – 125rb [l.14]) - Postscript (fol. 125rb [ls. 17-20])
Additiones 1-3.

donors.donor: qes gäbäz Wäldä Gäbrʾel (s. fols.: 43vb, ls. 19-20; 63ra, l. 20; 100rb, l.21), ʾato Täkwәlu (s. fols.: 43vb, l.20; 63ra, l.21; 100rb, l.22), Wälättä Mädḫәn (s. fols.: 43vb, ls. 12-13, 22; 63rb, l.1; 100rb, l.17), Wälättä Yoḥannәs (s. fols.: 43vb, ls. 15-16; 63rb, l.1; 100rb, l.19), Wälättä Giyorgis (s. fols.: 43vb, l. 16; 63rb, ls.1-2; 100rb, ls. 19-20), Wäldä Krәstos (s. fols.: 43vb, l.13; 63rb, l.2; 100rb, ls. 17-18), Gäbrä Krәstos (s. fols.: 43vb, l.14; 63rb, l.3; 100rb, l.18), Gäbrä Mäsqäl (s. fols.: 43vb, l.14; 63rb, l.3; 100rb, l.18), Wäldä Ḥawaryat (s. fols.: 43vb, ls. 14-15; 63rb, l.4; 100rb, l.19).

owners.owner: Initially the book was in possession of the church of Maryam ʾAbaʿko (s. Additiones).

bindings.binding: Wooden boards covered with reddish-brown tooled leather; textile inlays. Two pairs of sewing stations.

bnothers.bnother: Two pairs of chains of endband stitches at the spine cover.

squires.squire: A(5; s.l. 1, stub after 5/fols. 1r-5v) – I(6/fols. 6r-11v) – II(4; s.l. 3, stub after 2; 4, stub after 3/fols. 12r-15v) – III(8/fols. 16r-23v) – ፪IV(8/fols. 24r-31v) – ፫V(8/fols. 32r-39v) – ፬VI(8; s.l. 2, stub after 7; 7, stub after 2/fols. 40r-47v) – ፭VII(8/fols. 48r-55v) – ፮VIII(8/fols. 56r-63v) – ፯IX(6; s.l. 3, stub after 4; 4, stub after 3/fols. 64r-69v) – ፰X(8/fols. 70r-77v) – ፱XI(8/fols. 78r-85v) – ፲XII(8/fols. 86r-93v) – ፲፩XIII(8/fols. 94r-101v) – ፲፪XIV(8/fols. 102r-109v) – ፲፫?XV(10; s.l. 4, stub after 6; 7, stub after 3/fols. 110r-119v) –XVI(9; s.l. 9, stub before 1/fols. 120r-128v).

taunit.mr-info: All data are for the second page of the first Gospel, recto side (fol. 17r).
taunit.rl-info: Pricking and ruling are visible. Ruling pattern: 1A-1A-1A1A/0-0/0-0/C. Primary pricks are visible. Ruling pricks are visible. Structural pricks are partly visible. The upper line is written above the ruling. The bottom line is written above the ruling.

otherdetails.otherdetail: The quire marks are misplaced; the quiremarks from 7 (፯) to 13 (፲፫) are written by a different hand. Concerning the introduction, the contents and the postscript of the Gospels, cp. R. ZUURMOND, Novum Testamentum Aethiopice: the Synoptic Gospels, Part I: General Introduction, Part II: Edition of the Gospel of Mark, Stuttgart 1989 (AeF 27), 1-31. The content of the last leaf (fol. 12ra – rb [l.6]) of the “Canon Tables” is summarizing the full text of the Canons Table without columns.

additional.cont: Fol. 43vb, ls. 12-24: Note on commissioning of the writing extended by the donation statement.
additional.det: The note containt the date 1919, a year of Luke (= 1927 A.D.).

additional.cont: Fol. 63ra l.18-63rb: Ownership note.

drawing.details: A drawing in place of a miniature: interlaces between two ornamental bands (?).

frames.frame: Fol. 16rab: elaborate coloured (red, yellow, green, orange, brown, reddish-brown, black) ornamental band with three lateral extensions; interlaces, geometric and anthropomorphic motifs. Fol. 44rab: two connected coloured (yellow, brown, reddish-brown, green), horizontal ornamental bands above the columns; geometric motifs, interlaces. Fol. 64rab: simple, narrow, coloured (yellow, green, brown and reddish-brown), horizontal ornamental band; geometric motifs, interlaces. Fol. 101rab: coloured (yellow, green, orange, brown, reddish-brown) horizontal and vertical ornamental band with three lateral extensions; interlaces, geometric, floral, zoomorhic (birds) and anthropomorphic motifs.
